title: SK Traitor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use the abilities of the role you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You will be given a random SK role. That is your role, but you win with the Town.

> You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.

> You will not gain access to the factional chat, nor will you gain the attribute that allows you to kill roleblockers. You will still be roleblock immune.

> Yes, this can also be referred to as "sk" because we need more than 26 sks to appear with the command =sk.

desc:
Post 1551
*"I won't even ask you who the Serial Killers are."*
*"Wait I know them!"*
*"...You do?"*
*"Yeah, they're....... oh wait I forgot."*
*"Of course you did."*
*"Oh wait, I remembered something!"*
*An Amnesiac Serial Killer has remembered that they were like the Beekeeper Serial Killer.*
